securityTips: Use strong and unique passwords for each of your accounts.
Be cautious of phishing attempts and avoid clicking on suspicious links or attachments.
Keep your software, apps, and devices up to date to protect against vulnerabilities.
Avoid using public Wi-Fi for sensitive activities like online banking or logging into accounts.
Regularly review your privacy settings on social media and other platforms.
Use a password manager to store and generate strong passwords securely.
Log out of accounts when using shared or public devices.
Monitor your accounts regularly for any suspicious activity.
Backup important data and use encryption to protect sensitive information.
